DOC.detailed_description: In present study , effect bolus intrinsically label milk directly hour one-legged NMES ( Neuromuscular Electrical Stimulation ) study two condition : day immediately prior sleep
DOC.criteria: Age 6585 year Male 18.5 ≤ BMI ≤ 30.0 Type II diabetes All co morbidity interact mobility muscle metabolism low limb ( e.g . arthrosis , arthritis , spasticity/rigidity , neurological disorder , paralysis , hip/knee surgery ) . Use anticoagulant , blood disease , allergy lidocaine Use NSAIDs ( nonsteroidal antiinflammatory drug ) acetylsalicylic acid Patients suffer PKU ( Phenylketonuria ) Presence implantable cardioverter defibrillator and/or pacemaker Performed regular resistance type exercise past 6 month Use tool assist walk ( cane/ crutches/ walker ) ( Partial ) foot/ leg amputation
